Reviews.Title: You know how they say you get what you pay for?  This TV proves that
Reviews.Author: Keith  Watson
Reviews.Content: This is a great little 12vDC television.  Great picture and acceptable sound quality.  Hooked it up to the external antenna on my boat and got more than 35 channels--all crystal clear.The vendor--TreatYourBoatRight--was very responsive and shipped the same day I placed the order.Thanks Amazon!

ProductInfo.Features:
HD Ready Yes
Voltage - Input Range (Volts) 12
Voltage - Input Range (Volts) 12 VDC Power
Resolution (VxH) 1366 x 768 WXGA
Waterproof Rating NONE
ProductInfo.Name: Jensen Je1512Led 15" Led Hdtv
